name: vercel-azdo-pr-comment-task
friendlyName: Vercel Azure DevOps Pull Request Comment Task
description: An Azure Pipelines Task Extension for commenting on pull requests that trigger Vercel builds
helpMarkDown: Something not working? Get help here: https://vercel.com/help
author: Vercel

inputs.name: azureToken
inputs.label: Azure Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: An Azure personal access token with the Git 'PullRequestContribute' permission for your Azure DevOps Organization (https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/organizations/accounts/use-personal-access-tokens-to-authenticate)

inputs.name: deploymentTaskMessage
inputs.label: Deployment Task Message (from Vercel Deployment Task)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The message to be commented on the Pull Request. Generally is created by the Vercel Deployment Task.
